190090.「ほかに 聞きたいことは あるでおじゃるか？\n<break>: Is there anything else you'd like to ask me?<break>

190091.「どのげんまが 気になるでおじゃるか？\n<break>: Which one do you care about?<break>

190092.「どの説明を 聞きたいでおじゃるか？\n<break>: Which explanation would you like to hear?<break>

190093.「げんま召喚で召喚した げんまは\n 一緒に 戦ってくれるでおじゃる！\n<br:
A summoned demon will fight with you! But they don't fight with you forever... After about two minutes, the giants will
disappear... GEMMA has its strengths and weaknesses... For more information, check out the Genma you're interested in!

190094.「召喚したげんまは 術者のちからが\n ある程度影響されるのでおじゃる。\n<b:
The summoned element is affected by the power of the sorcerer to a certain extent, so... Eventually, if your level grows, the summoned
monster will be stronger than the current one...

190095.「げんま召喚のとくぎは 少し特殊でおじゃる。\n その名の通り げんまを召喚する:
The summoning magic is a bit special... As the name implies, it summons a genie. You can only summon one Gemma per party. If there's
already a Gemma in the party, summoning it will replace the current one... Change your summoned powers according to the situation to
create an advantageous situation...

190096.「マロは げんま博士 レイメイでおじゃる！\n げんまについて 聞きたいことは\:
I'm Raimei, and I can explain to you about
your spirits! Do you have any questions
about them?
<break>

190104.「よく来たでおじゃる。\n マロは 天地雷鳴士のダイゴ味である\n げんま大好き:
Welcome... Maro is the Daigo flavor of Tenchi-Raimeishi, the Genma-loving Genma Doctor Reimei... I'm sure you'll visit Maro
when you're ready to become a thunderer.

190105.「よく来たでおじゃる。\n マロは 天地雷鳴士のダイゴ味である\n げんま大好き:
Welcome... Maro is the Daigo flavor of the Tenchi-Raimyoji, the genma-loving Dr. Reimei. Are you familiar with the Genma Summoning, a
technique available only to the Tenchi- Raimeishi? As the name implies, Summoning Genma is a technique where you summon Genma
to fight alongside you... If you have any questions about giants, you can always come to Maro! Now...

191157.「げんま解放は げんまの秘めたちからを\n 引き出す事ができる 天地雷鳴士の\n:
It's one of the special powers of the Tenchi- Raimei warriors, allowing them to unlock the secrets of the universe. What! There's a
trick that can only be used when you're drawing from the hidden secrets of your source with Gemma Liberation! For more
information, check out the Gemma Release Skill in the Gemma Introduction!

232765.「強くなった げんまの詳細を知りたい時は\n 追加効果を確認すると よいでおじゃ:
If you want to know more about the stronger
Genma, you can check the additional effects!<bw_break>

251640.「どのげんまの\n 見た目を変えるでおじゃるか？\n<break>:
Which one of these will you change the
appearance of?<break>

251641.「すまないのう。\n ドレスチェンジには プリズムという\n 貴重な品が 必要で:
I'm sorry... To change dresses, you need a
prism, a very valuable item. Get the dress
prism and give it to Maro, please!<break>

251642.「<%sL_GENMA>の 見た目は\n 変更できないでおじゃるよ。\n<br>:
You can't change the appearance of <%sL_GENMA>, Uncle... If you want to change it, you'll have to give the dress prism to
Maro!

251643.「<%sL_PRISM>に 見た目を\n 変えるでおじゃるか？\n<yesno>:
Would you like me to change your appearance
to <%sL_PRISM>?<yesno><break>

251644.<%sL_GENMA>は \n<%sL_PRISM>の 姿になった！\n<end:
<%sL_GENMA> has taken on the form of
<%sL_PRISM>!<end>

251646.「それだと 今と変わらないでおじゃるよ。\n 他の見た目を 選んでたもれ。\n<:
That's the same as what we have now, Uncle...
You'll have to choose another look.<end>

251647.「『げんまの見た目設定』では\n げんまの見た目を 変えられるでおじゃる。\n<:
You can change your character's appearance in "Set Appearance"... To get a look you haven't unlocked yet, you'll need a talisman that
seals that look... Once you have it, give it to Maro. Even if you change your appearance, you can always change it back and it won't
affect your magic power, so don't worry...

253145.「マロは げんま博士 レイメイでおじゃる！\n<end>:
I'm Reimei, expert on druid spirits!
<end>

253146.「そ……それは\n <%sL_PRISM>でおじゃるな！？\n<br>\n「その:
That... That's <%sL_PRISM>, isn't it? With the power of that Spirit Charm, you can give your Genma a new look... Of course, you can
always return to your original appearance, and changing your appearance won't affect the power of your genma. What do you think? Why
don't we use Maro's technique to free the appearance of the genma that resides in <%sL_PRISM>?

253147.「ほほほ。よい返事でおじゃる。\n それでは……。\n<br>\n「ヒフミ ヨイ:
... Good answer. And now... Hifumi Yoimnaya
Kotomorororane... Reveal yourself, new Genma!<end>

253149.「それは 残念でおじゃるな。\n 気が変わったら いつでも\n マロに 渡すでお:
I'm sorry to hear that, Uncle... Whenever you
change your mind, I'll give it to Malo,
Uncle...<bw_break>

256831.「また げんまについて 聞きたくなったり\n げんまの見た目を 変えたくなったら:
If you ever want to hear more about the
demon, or change the appearance of the demon,
you can visit Maro!<turn_end>
